name: pIEt Consulting BVBA
goal: assistance to companies in the biocides market, primarily SMEs. the EU legislation is so complex that smaller companies cannot afford to develop the knowledge in house. I assist them to understand and comply with the different legislations applicable to their biocides business (BPR, CLP, REACH,...)
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Environment, Food Safety, Internal Market
